content: You awaken in a dark lab, memories of your past life flickering...
A rogue drone attacks you, its malfunctioning AI hinting at a larger conspiracy...
Encrypted log entry: Project Echo Nexus - Phase 2 Initiated.
You recall fleeing the experiment chambers, alarms blaring...
A distant memory of your mentor's warning echoes in your mind...
The worn keycard bears the insignia of the Nexus core.
A pulsing cube of darkness haunts your thoughts, promising power.
The Cube of Shadows stirs as you draw near its chamber...
With a final burst of light, the Cube of Shadows shatters, and peace returns.
